alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 9:44PM CST until January 30 at 2:43PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.Friday afternoon at 1245 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Between 94 and 97 feet, some secondary roads near Lock 5 park and Sandpiper Road begin to flood and could cut off residents. Some roads leading into Roebuck Landing are flooded between 96 and 97 feet. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 85.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 88.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 86.2 feet Saturday evening. It will rise above flood stage Sunday afternoon and crest near 91.6 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
